programme.title: Return to Office

programme.desc: Reba tries to reconcile with Van and his parents, but her plan backfires when his mother walks out on her husband and stays with Reba.

programme.desc: The station's sportscaster quits after overhearing Frasier's speculation that the man will be fired.

programme.desc: Frasier deals with depressing callers when he agrees to cover for the sportscaster on Christmas.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier tells his listeners about the woman with whom his father spent the night.

programme.desc: Lilly, a hopeless romantic and literary enthusiast, gets the surprise of a lifetime when her favorite author, Jane Austen, comes into her life.

programme.desc: When Lolly's Aunt Gert gives her three magical lemon drops, she gets to experience what her life would have been like if she had made different choices and lived those unfulfilled dreams.

programme.desc: Cliff's plans to sue the owner of a dog that bit him become secondary when he meets the woman to whom the dog belongs.

programme.desc: Reba's children carouse at Brock and Barbra Jean's place; Cheyenne and Van commiserate with each other about the baby.

programme.desc: Blanche, Dorothy and Sophia cheer up a hospitalized Rose after she becomes ill at a crashed class reunion.

programme.desc: Dorothy and Lucas' plot to get even with Blanche leads to a surprise wedding.

programme.desc: A woman down on her luck falls into a job as the assistant to a football player out on injury.

programme.title: The Perfect Catch
programme.desc: A single mother (Nikki DeLoach) reinvents her struggling diner while spending time with a former high-school boyfriend (Andrew W. Walker) who's now a superstar baseball player.

programme.title: Hearts in the Game
programme.desc: Top New York City publicist Hazel Miller is tasked with spinning the image of MLB pitcher Diego Vasquez, who froze during Game 7 of the World Series. He also happens to be the guy who broke her heart in high school.

programme.title: A Winning Team
programme.desc: When a professional soccer player finds herself no longer in the game, she teams up with a small-town coach to lead her niece's team to the playoffs.

programme.title: Mystery 101
programme.desc: A community theater troupe mounts a production of a murder mystery that Amy Winslow unearthed; on opening night, someone tries to kill the leading lady, and Travis is forced to halt the show because it has become a crime scene.
